code: import axios from'./axios';var bookPath='/book';var getAllBooks=function getAllBooks(data){return axios.get("".concat(bookPath,"/all"),{params:data.options});};var getAllGenres=function getAllGenres(){return axios.get("".concat(bookPath,"/genres"));};var getOneBook=function getOneBook(id){return axios.get("".concat(bookPath,"/").concat(id));};var setRating=function setRating(data){return axios.post("".concat(bookPath,"/rate"),data);};var addComment=function addComment(data){return axios.post("".concat(bookPath,"/add-comment"),data);};var getRecommendations=function getRecommendations(){return axios.get("".concat(bookPath,"/recommendations"));};var getFavorite=function getFavorite(){return axios.get("".concat(bookPath,"/favorites"));};var addToFavorite=function addToFavorite(data){return axios.post("".concat(bookPath,"/add-favorites"),data);};var removeFromFavorite=function removeFromFavorite(data){return axios.delete("".concat(bookPath,"/remove-favorites"),{data:data});};export default{getAllBooks:getAllBooks,getAllGenres:getAllGenres,getOneBook:getOneBook,setRating:setRating,addComment:addComment,getRecommendations:getRecommendations,getFavorite:getFavorite,addToFavorite:addToFavorite,removeFromFavorite:removeFromFavorite};
